description: This source file contains functions related to firewall rules management, including appending rules for device-based policy disablement, IP-specific rules, and LAN to WAN site policies.

methods.name: void do_device_based_pp_disabled_appendrule(FILE * fp,const char * ins_num,const char * lan_ifname,const char * query)
methods.description: Appends a device-based policy disablement rule to the firewall configuration file, excluding a specific platform.

methods.name: void do_device_based_pp_disabled_ip_appendrule(FILE * fp,const char * ins_num,const char * ipAddr)
methods.description: Adds a rule to disable policy processing for a specific IP address.

methods.name: int do_parcon_mgmt_lan2wan_pc_site_appendrule(FILE * fp)
methods.description: Appends a LAN to WAN policy rule for specific ports.

methods.name: void do_parcon_mgmt_lan2wan_pc_site_insertrule(FILE * fp,int index,char * nstdPort)
methods.description: Inserts a LAN to WAN policy rule at a specified position for a given port.

ctags.name: do_device_based_pp_disabled_appendrule
ctags.signature: (FILE * fp,const char * ins_num,const char * lan_ifname,const char * query)
